documentation.text:
@title RawMaterial (Simplified Batch Contract)
 @dev Data container for raw materials. State managed strictly by SupplyChainLogic via delegatecall.

@dev Sets status to InTransit. Requires Created state.
 @notice Relies on SupplyChainLogic to provide a valid, non-zero transporter.

@dev Sets status to Received. Requires InTransit state.
 @notice Relies on SupplyChainLogic to ensure the caller (_receiver) matches intendedManufacturer.
@dev Sets status to Destroyed. Can be called unless already destroyed.

devdoc.details: Data container for raw materials. State managed strictly by SupplyChainLogic via delegatecall.

setDestroyed(bytes32).details: Sets status to Destroyed. Can be called unless already destroyed.

setInTransit(address).details: Sets status to InTransit. Requires Created state.

setReceived().details: Sets status to Received. Requires InTransit state.

devdoc.title: RawMaterial (Simplified Batch Contract)

setInTransit(address).notice: Relies on SupplyChainLogic to provide a valid, non-zero transporter.

setReceived().notice: Relies on SupplyChainLogic to ensure the caller (_receiver) matches intendedManufacturer.
